customFields.Update notes: Linda 22 Aug 2022: Added RN_Smoke_Tests label during test case cleanup.

inline.description:
Settings - Notifications - Mobile
————————————————————————————
  1. Tap the three-dot menu in the top right of your screen
  2. Tap "Settings", then "Notifications"
  3. Tap "Mobile"
  4. Ensure set to "For all activity" and "Online, away, or offline"
  5. Go back to channel view and put app in background or lock screen
  6. Have another user post a message
  7. Tap notification when it arrives
inline.expectedResult: • Notification fires, tapping or swiping notification opens to that channel

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• (Cannot Reproduce) RN Android push notifications sometimes do not open to the channel the notification came from — MM-12675
  • RN: Notifications badges are not cleared from other clients when channel is changed via push notification after the RN app is opened — MM-13896
  • RN: Text box obstructs bottom part of the message when opened from notification banner — MM-21276
